rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: An inviting entrance with a wheelchair accessible ramp leading into the central courtyard.

rooms.name: Garage
rooms.description: Two-car garage space integrated seamlessly on one side of the plot.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: Open courtyard providing natural light and ventilation to adjoining spaces; includes wheelchair-accessible pathways.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious Mediterranean style living room with access to the central courtyard via sliding glass doors.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living area, designed for family gatherings and wheelchair accessible seating arrangements.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with an open layout near the dining area; designed for easy movement for wheelchair users.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with a balcony overlooking the courtyard. Features wide doorways and accessible fixtures per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Second bedroom including a spacious balcony, wheelchair accessible design.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Third bedroom with a balcony and open plan ensuring clear pathways.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Fourth bedroom featuring an accessible balcony and ample natural light from the courtyard.
